name: Character Controller Demo (EnokV)
description:
This is a testbed for a 2D platforming / metroidvania kinematic character controller in the style of source engine scaffolding.

Free assets used in this testbed:
https://admurin.itch.io/free-pixel-character-revamped
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/footsteps-gravel-1753...
